tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legislative_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_number INT NOT NULL,
    bill_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    bill_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Bills (bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 bill_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
 bill_title TEXT NOT NULL,
 introduced_date DATE,
 status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending')

CREATE TABLE Resolutions (resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 resolution_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
 resolution_title TEXT NOT NULL,
 passed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
 vote_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE Legislators (legislator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 party VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
 district VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE bills (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_title VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    introduction_date DATE,
    last_action_date DATE,
    sponsor VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resolution_title VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    introduction_date DATE,
    last_action_date DATE,
    sponsor VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE votes (
    vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id INT,
    resolution_id INT,
    voter_name VARCHAR(100),
    vote_decision VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE bills (
    bill_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_title TEXT,
    introduction_date DATE,
    status TEXT,
    sponsor TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    resolution_title TEXT,
    introduction_date DATE,
    status TEXT,
    sponsor TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE legislators (
    legislator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    party TEXT,
    district TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE votes (
    vote_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id UUID,
    legislator_id UUID,
    vote_option TEXT,
    vote_date DATE
);
